name.baseName: Synthetic graphite production ; Synthetic graphite ; Carbon black, petroleum coke
合成石墨生产;合成石墨;炭黑、石油焦

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Using carbon black and petroleum coke to synthesize artificial graphite through a series of crushing, screening, roasting and other processes
使用炭黑及石油焦经过一系列破碎、筛分、焙烧等处理合成人造石墨

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Shimian Jineng New Materials Co., Ltd
石棉县集能新材料有限公司

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Graphite is synthesized by mixing petroleum coke and carbon black through medium crushing, grinding, screening, roasting, and secondary roasting.
将石油焦和炭黑混合后经过中碎、磨粉、筛分、焙烧、二次焙烧后合成石墨
technology.technologicalApplicability: The synthetic graphite produced through this industrial process is used for various applications, including but not limited to: electrodes for electric arc furnaces, brushes for electric motors, anodes for lithium-ion batteries, heat sinks in electronics, and as a lubricant in certain mechanical systems. The high conductivity and thermal resistance properties make synthetic graphite suitable for advanced technological applications, particularly in the renewable energy and electronics sectors.
通过该工业过程生产的合成石墨用于多种应用，包括但不限于：电弧炉电极、电动机电刷、锂离子电池阳极、电子设备中的散热器，以及在某些机械系统中作为润滑剂。合成石墨的高导电性和热阻性质使其适用于高级技术应用，特别是在可再生能源和电子行业。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: All data comes from the environmental performance assessment report of Shimian County Jineng New Materials Co., Ltd.
数据全部来源于石棉县集能新材料有限公司环境影响评价报告
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: The data may have been simply multiplied or divided
可能对数据进行了简单的乘除法处理

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Yin, R., Hu, S. & Yang, Y. Life cycle inventories of the commonly used materials for lithium-ion batteries in China. Journal of Cleaner Production227, 960–971 (2019).
Yin, R., Hu, S. & Yang, Y. Life cycle inventories of the commonly used materials for lithium-ion batteries in China. Journal of Cleaner Production227, 960–971 (2019).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Data users should consider the specific phases of the synthetic graphite production when utilizing this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) purposes. Ensure that all system boundaries are clearly defined, especially when it comes to the inclusion or exclusion of pre-processing steps, such as the acquisition of raw materials like carbon black and petroleum coke. The purification and possible environmental treatment stages before and after the central process should also be factored in. For comparative LCA studies, ensure consistency in functional units (e.g., mass of graphite produced) and the scope of the analyzed processes. This data set has undergone basic arithmetic operations; users should verify calculations against updated production metrics or assumptions pertinent to their LCA scenario.

数据使用者在使用该数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）时，应考虑合成石墨生产的特定阶段。确保所有系统边界清晰定义，特别是在包括或排除原材料获取步骤（如炭黑和石油焦的采购）时。中心过程前后的净化和可能的环境处理阶段也应纳入考虑。在进行比较性LCA研究时，确保功能单元（例如，生产的石墨质量）的一致性以及所分析过程的范围。该数据集已进行基本的算术运算；用户应验证计算是否符合对他们的LCA情景相关的更新的生产指标或假设。

completeness.common:other: Input and output energy, materials and other information are complete
输入、输出能源、材料等数据完整

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
